alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:48AM CST until December 19 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair, Cherokee and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Chewey. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs from near Fidler`s Bend to near Hanging Rock. Moderate flooding of agricultural lands may result in livestock issues. Travel around Hanging Rock is impacted. Road access near the river is cut off to residential homes southeast of Chewey Bridge. Access to Winset Hollow is cut off. A few cabins in the Fidler`s Bend area may have minor flooding. Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 14.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
